title: Armor Pen on ADC
body: When I play ad assassins i tend to go full armor pen to nuke out people, why don't people go full armor pen on adcs to nuke people? thanks

replies.body: Because adc benefit more from the ad on other items for their crits, they are aa based, so they rely on crits more than armor pen from abilities, + black cleaver is only good on mf for adc champs, so its usually last whisper as the only armor pen they get, it benefits their crits more than black cleaver anyway

its not hard to understand that physical damaging abilities work better with armor pen and ad than it does crit, adc use autho attacks more so they benefit from crit and ad more than pure armor pen, but what idiot doesn't build a last whisper on adc if the enemy has a lot of armor anyway, adc benefit from crit and ad + last whisper if needed, or in mf case black cleaver works well as well. Assassins work off killing fast with abilities, which is easier to do with armor pen, people like yasuo, he is more of a melee adc than an assassin, so he builds what an adc would. 

If the enemy has 70% armor having 300 ad, a last whisper and critting would do the same amount as an assassin doing 300 damage with 70% armor pen
